client.admin 源代码

from django.contrib import admin

# Register your models here.
from client.models.company import (
    Company,
    CompanyType,
    CompanySupplyChain,
    CompanyReviewLog,
    S1UserCompanyMap,
)
from client.models.config import Config
from client.models.contract import Contract, ContractTemplateType, ContractTemplate
from client.models.credit import Credit, CreditType, CreditClearType
from client.models.credit_certificate import (
    Business,
    CreditCertificateReceiveTimeLimit,
    WorkFlow,
    WorkFlowBusinessMap,
    CreditCertificate,
    CreditClear,
    CreditClearDetail,
    CreditCertificateEnclosure,
    CreditCurrentNode,
    FinanceProject,
    ReviewLog,
)
from client.models.menus import AppMenus
from client.models.permission import PermissionCategory, Permission, RolePermission
from client.models.role import Platform, Role, UserRole
from client.models.user import S1User


# user

[文档]class S1UserAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "username", "phone", "root_s1_user_id", "nick_name"]



# company

[文档]class CompanyAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "name", "credit_code", "s1_user_id", "uid"]




[文档]class CompanyTypeAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "desc_name", "name"]




[文档]class CompanySupplyChainAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "company", "chain_company", 's1_user_id', 'is_deleted']




[文档]class S1UserCompanyMapAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "company", "s1_user_id", "is_deleted"]




[文档]class CompanyReviewLogAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "company", "status", "s1_user_id"]



# contract

[文档]def make_download_data(modeladmin, request, queryset):
    """
    手动生成或打包文件至阿里云：
        - 在django admin 增加的一个动作
    """
    for contract in queryset.all():
        contract.generate_and_upload_file()



make_download_data.short_description = "生成或打包文件至阿里云"



[文档]class ContractAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "number", "contract_type", "credit_certificate", ]
    list_filter = ["contract_type", ]
    actions = [make_download_data]




[文档]class ContractTemplateTypeAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "desc_name", "name", ]




[文档]class ContractTemplateAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "contract_template_type", ]



# credit

[文档]class CreditAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "credit_number", "receive_company", "credit_type", "status"]




[文档]class CreditTypeAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "desc_name", "name"]




[文档]class CreditClearTypeAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "desc_name", "name"]



# credit_certificate

[文档]class BusinessAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "desc_name", "name"]




[文档]class CreditCertificateReceiveTimeLimitAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "name", "value"]




[文档]class WorkFlowAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "title", "code", "path"]




[文档]class WorkFlowBusinessMapAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "start_work_flow", "business"]




[文档]class CreditCertificateAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "company", "from_company", "number", "review_status", "business", "is_valid", "creditcurrentnode"]
    list_filter = ["review_status", "is_valid", "business"]




[文档]class CreditClearAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "credit_certificate", "is_clear", "pay_amount"]




[文档]class CreditClearDetailAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "credit_certificate", "status", "clear_principal"]




[文档]class CreditCertificateEnclosureAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ['id', 'contract_no', 'contract_amount', 'contract_sign_at', 'credit_certificate']




[文档]class CreditCurrentNodeAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ['id', 'credit_certificate', 'work_flow', ]




[文档]class FinanceProjectAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ['id', 'credit_certificate', 'finance_number', ]




[文档]class ReviewLogAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ['id', 'handle_status', 'result', 'handle_status', 'data_table', 'data_id', 'node', 's1_user_id', 'created_at']



# menus

[文档]class AppMenusAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = [
        "id", "title", "code", "icon", "sort_num", "path", "url",
        "is_deleted", "platform"
    ]



# permission

[文档]class PermissionCategoryAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "desc_name", "name"]




[文档]class PermissionAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "name", "code", "path", "is_deleted", "platform", "permission_category"]




[文档]class RolePermissionAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "permission", "role"]



# role

[文档]class PlatformAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "desc_name", "name"]




[文档]class RoleAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "name", "desc", "is_deleted", "platform"]




[文档]class UserRoleAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "s1_user_id", "role"]




[文档]class ConfigAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ["id", "name", "code", "value", "value_type", "is_deleted"]



# user
admin.site.register(S1User, S1UserAdmin)

# company
admin.site.register(Company, CompanyAdmin)
admin.site.register(CompanyType, CompanyTypeAdmin)
admin.site.register(CompanySupplyChain, CompanySupplyChainAdmin)
admin.site.register(S1UserCompanyMap, S1UserCompanyMapAdmin)
admin.site.register(CompanyReviewLog, CompanyReviewLogAdmin)

# contract
admin.site.register(Contract, ContractAdmin)
admin.site.register(ContractTemplateType, ContractTemplateTypeAdmin)
admin.site.register(ContractTemplate, ContractTemplateAdmin)

# Credit
admin.site.register(Credit, CreditAdmin)
admin.site.register(CreditType, CreditTypeAdmin)
admin.site.register(CreditClearType, CreditClearTypeAdmin)

# credit_certificate
admin.site.register(Business, BusinessAdmin)
admin.site.register(CreditCertificateReceiveTimeLimit, CreditCertificateReceiveTimeLimitAdmin)
admin.site.register(WorkFlow, WorkFlowAdmin)
admin.site.register(WorkFlowBusinessMap, WorkFlowBusinessMapAdmin)
admin.site.register(CreditCertificate, CreditCertificateAdmin)
admin.site.register(CreditClear, CreditClearAdmin)
admin.site.register(CreditClearDetail, CreditClearDetailAdmin)
admin.site.register(CreditCertificateEnclosure, CreditCertificateEnclosureAdmin)
admin.site.register(CreditCurrentNode, CreditCurrentNodeAdmin)
admin.site.register(FinanceProject, FinanceProjectAdmin)
admin.site.register(ReviewLog, ReviewLogAdmin)

# menus
admin.site.register(AppMenus, AppMenusAdmin)

# permission
admin.site.register(PermissionCategory, PermissionCategoryAdmin)
admin.site.register(Permission, PermissionAdmin)
admin.site.register(RolePermission, RolePermissionAdmin)

# role
admin.site.register(Platform, PlatformAdmin)
admin.site.register(Role, RoleAdmin)
admin.site.register(UserRole, UserRoleAdmin)
admin.site.register(Config, ConfigAdmin)
